chapters.title: Chapter 50: Meetings at the EyeChapter 51: Against the ShadowChapter 52: There Is Neither Beginning Nor EndChapter 53: The Wheel TurnsGlossary
chapters.info: Uren din Jubai Soaring Gull, p. 658 (702)—Sea Folk scholar and deviser of the Farede Calendar, which measured dates from the arbitrarily set end of the War of the Hundred Years as years of the New Era (NE). This calendar is currently in use.
